SELECT s.*, p.id AS product_id, p.name AS product_name, p.description AS product_description, pr.id AS price_id, pr.policy AS price_policy, pr.price AS price_price FROM ec_sku s JOIN ec_product p ON s.product_id=p.id JOIN ec_category c ON p.category_id=c.id JOIN ec_price pr ON s.id=pr.sku_id WHERE c.wx_app_id=#{wxApp.id} AND s.is_del=0 AND p.is_del=0
AND s.`name` LIKE '%${name}%'
